attributes.action: legalise the brutal and unjust killing of our fellow humans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair in this day and age that we do not have the freedom to kill whoever we like. This should be addressed. We must be allowed to kill. Then, we feast.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
